input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product title.

Product title:
ReadyPlug USB Cable Compatible with HP 1320 LaserJet Printer (10 Feet, Black)

Product keywords:
ReadyPlug Data Cable Compatible with HP 1320 LaserJet Printer
USB 2.0 High Speed Cable upto 480mbps
Length: 10 Feet (3 Meters) - Color: Black
Reduces strain on device port
Keeps cable out of the way
Protected from EMI/RFI interference
Uses an outer foil shield, inner braid shield and twisted-pair composition to ensure performance
For PC or Mac Computer

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This ReadyPlug USB cable is very long and black. It’s for connecting a computer to a HP 1320 LaserJet printer.
input_text.Response B: ReadyPlug 10ft USB Printer Cable is compatible with HP 1320 LaserJet Printer. This ReadyPlug USB Printer Cable is designed to provide reliable connectivity between your computer and printer. The USB 2.0 cable provides a reliable connection and fast data transfer speeds, making it easy to print documents and photos. The 10ft cable length provides a generous amount of cable, which allows you to place your printer in a convenient location without being constrained by the length of the included cable. The black color of the cable provides a clean, professional look that will blend in with most surroundings.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: B is more complex, lose concentration reading/understanding it
